column5: This charming new Hill Country home is on an exquisite private stretch of Bandera Creek with pools, falls and hammocks to create the perfect atmosphere for total relaxation and privacy. The house is beautifully decorated and the grounds are a treasure of well thought out landscaping adding a graceful feeling to the surroundings. Wildlife abounds here in this country setting on ten acres and yet you are just two miles from the shops, restaurants and attractions of Bandera.
